    ModernRoboticsI2cCompassSensor implements support for the Modern Robotics compass sensor.

    Modern Robotics I2C IR Seeker Sensor
    ModernRoboticsI2cRangeSensor
    ModernRoboticsI2cRangeSensor implements support for the MR ultrasonic/optical combo range sensor.
    ModernRoboticsUsbController
    This class provides services common to both Modern Robotics motor and servo controllers
    ModernRoboticsUsbDcMotorController
    Modern Robotics USB DC Motor Controller
    ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
    Base class for Modern Robotics USB Devices
    ModernRoboticsUsbDeviceInterfaceModule
    Modern Robotics USB Core Device Interface Module Use HardwareDeviceManager to create an instance of this class
    ModernRoboticsUsbI2cController
    This class provides a common implementation point for functionality shared amongst Modern Robotics USB I2cControllers.
    ModernRoboticsUsbLegacyModule
    Modern Robotics USB Legacy Module Use HardwareDeviceManager to create an instance of this class
    ModernRoboticsUsbServoController
    Modern Robotics USB Servo Controller
    PretendModernRoboticsUsbDevice
    This class implements a dummy RobotUsbDevice that will apparently successfully do reads and writes but doesn't actually do anything.

    ReadWriteRunnableStandard
    Main loop that copies the read/write buffer from/to the device
